content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I am an experienced landlord and I am confident that I can provide you with a fair and competitive rental price. May I ask what you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student, and I am looking for a low rental price. I am dependable and responsible, so I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am interested in your apartment, which is 25 square meters. What is the rental price you propose?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest, Hassan. I understand that you are a student and want to keep your rental costs low. However, I am afraid I cannot provide you with a price that is lower than the market rate for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. My goal is to maximize my gains as a landlord, so I am not willing to negotiate below the going rate. I hope you can understand my position.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Hassan. I appreciate your willingness to compromise and negotiate with me. Based on my research and experience as a landlord, I am comfortable accepting your offer of 700 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair and competitive rental price for a 25 square meter apartment in Munich. I look forward to working with you and am excited to have you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
